GDD Base C		0	0	0	0	5	5	5	10-corn	10-corn	10-corn	5	5	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

Comment:														first value is for ‘beef hay’ and second for ‘dairy hay’			begin to reduce 1%/day after first -2C min.temp in fall- then frost		use First Cycle Alfalfa	One cutting of grass hay (at 100% pt)- then hold until frost		go until frost	go until frost		go until frost	go until frost				go until frost	run until frost	run until frost			run until frost	run until frost	run until frost	assume that end of season is equal to July 15 + (July 15 - Greenup)  (I.e. symmetry around July 15)																								
Comment 2:																	use First Cycle Alfalfa		Est. GU_mint as 600 GDD																			Estimate greenup from 30 day Tmean = 5 C (at end of 30 day period) less X days (10?)																								
																																										go until frost	go until frost																			
																																						Note that these Kcbr curves are POTENTIAL Kc's and MUST be used with a 																								
																																						soil water balance and stress reduction coefficient to derive ACTUAL ET.
